Noun: United States anthropologist who studied the Seneca (1818-188)
United States biologist who formulated the chromosome theory of heredity (1866-194)
a Welsh buccaneer who raided Spanish colonies in the West Indies for the English (1635-168)
soldier in the American Revolution who defeated the British in the battle of Cowpens, South Carolina (1736-180)
an American breed of small compact saddle horses
